# Magic Shop (Building)
## Overview
**Magic Shop**

**Create** 40 Goods, 1 Influence, 33 Labor, 1 Magic (1,590 gp)

**Rooms** 1 Furnishings ([[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]), 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Reliquary (Room)|Reliquary]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]], 2 [[Vault (Room)|Vaults]]

A shop that specializes in buying and selling magic items, spells, and magical remedies.
